NEW or UPDATE or DELETE | | issueDate | `'dateTime'` | Date and time of the MEL item work order was issued at in UTC | | clearedDate | `'dateTime'` | Date and time the MEL item work order was closed in UTC | | limitFlightHour | `'number'` | MEL item limitation based on hours | | limitLandingCycle | `'number'` | MEL item limitation based on cycles | | limitDay | `'number'` | MEL item limitation based on days | | ataReference | `'string'` | The MEL item ATA reference that includes chapter, item, subchapter and section| | description | `'string'` | Description of MEL item work order | | cdl | `'boolean'` | CDL indicator.
